name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Site Reliability Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications and ensuring system reliability and efficiency across the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in managing infrastructure on **AWS**, utilizing **Linux**, and implementing **MySQL** databases while employing **PHP** for optimal backend performance. Skilled in automation tools including **Ansible** and **Bash**, and experienced in monitoring applications using **Datadog** and **New Relic**. 

Demonstrated expertise in deploying and managing applications in cloud environments with a focus on stability and performance optimizations. Successful in aligning development with ITIL Foundation principles to enhance operational efficiency. Strong background in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS standards. Known for building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and employing **Apache** servers for robust application delivery. Adept at leveraging **AWS Systems Manager Patch Manager** to enhance security and patch management strategies.
